original_text: Moreover, brethren, I would not that ye should be ignorant, how that all our fathers were under the cloud, and all passed through the sea;
korean_text: 형제들아 나는 너희가 알지 못하기를 원하지 아니하노니 우리 조상들이 다 구름 아래에 있고 바다 가운데로 지나며

sentences.original_text: I would not that ye should be ignorant,
how that all our fathers were under the cloud,
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 모든 조상들이 구름 아래 있었으며

sentences.original_text: and all passed through the sea;
